```{r}
library(mcnemarControl)

dat <- mcnemar_example_long(seed = 3)
trts <- c("TrtA", "TrtB", "TrtC")
fit <- mcnemar_control(dat, "id", "condition", "outcome", control = "Control", treatments = trts, ci = 0.95)
summary(fit)
```
